Using more complex interactions and feedback loops the AI engine can be used as a way of splitting existing content in modules, expanding a documentation draft or to create a hierarchy of new DITA XML topics from an initial content.
Split Topic Analyze the current DITA XML topic based on modular document development best practices. If the topic is too large or contains multiple subjects, the AI may split it into several topic files. Example.
Expand Draft Enhances a draft of a DITA XML documentation topic by refining preliminary draft content, adding markup consistent with similar topics, and incorporating images. Example
Create Topics Generates DITA XML topics from user input, incorporating relevant project content. It creates a topic hierarchy, assigns DITA types, and proposes a DITA map location. Topics are saved and added upon user approval. Example: Tulips Appearance Growing tulips Maintainance problems
